summary: All five chapters meet style guide requirements. Modifications are well-integrated with existing content, maintain consistent voice, and follow formatting conventions.

chapters_reviewed.notes: Quick Start callout and Meet Rella section integrate smoothly. Terminology consistent. Second person voice maintained throughout.
Probability explanation and roleplay prompts add clarity. Tables properly formatted. Low Attribute guidance provides concrete behavioral examples.
Resolution walkthrough example is comprehensive. When-to-roll examples clearly demonstrate three-part test. Attribute selection guidance well-structured.
Progress/Pressure pattern callout is prominent. Condition roleplay table provides practical guidance. Tag effects now use definitive language.
Combat at a Glance provides excellent orientation. Tick values table is concrete. Stakes question elevated appropriately. Turn order options clear.
